type: Trading Farms - Set Up Each Node on the Network

definition.text: Install the markets you wish to work with and remove the tasks where you don't need them.

paragraphs.text: When you install a market, several structures of nodes are created on each of the main sections of the network hierarchy for all nodes defined on the network: data storage, data mining, testing environment, and production environment, as well as the corresponding time machines in the charting space.
In other words, the process of installing a new market replicates all data structures in all nodes.
You will most likely want to delete the tasks that you donâ€™t need on certain nodes, and keep only those that you wish each node to handle.
